dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, Kazakhstan, you know, didn't really have much going on in international sports recently, right? I kinda just skimmed something.

dialogue_turns.text: Oh, wait, no. Uh, actually, the Ministry of Sports and Tourism says they won many international competitions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, wait, no. Uh, actually, the Ministry of Sports and Tourism says they won many international competitions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, really? I, like, totally missed that. What, um, what kind of stuff?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, really? I, like, totally missed that. What, um, what kind of stuff?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, there's Judo. Abiba Abuzhakynova won a World Grand Prix stage in Austria.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, there's Judo. Abiba Abuzhakynova won a World Grand Prix stage in Austria.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Judo: Abiba Abuzhakynova (48 kg) won the World Grand Prix stage, which ended in the Austrian city of Linz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Abuzhakynova? That's, like, a big deal, right? Beating, uh, a Japanese judoka?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Abuzhakynova? That's, like, a big deal, right? Beating, uh, a Japanese judoka?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the final, she defeated 19-year-old Japanese judoka Sachiyo Yoshino.

dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, she defeated Sachiyo Yoshino, who's pretty young too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, she defeated Sachiyo Yoshino, who's pretty young too.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Huh. Okay, Judo. Anything else? Like, just individual stuff?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Huh. Okay, Judo. Anything else? Like, just individual stuff?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Nope. Erbol Khamitov got a bronze in Para skiing at the World Championships in Norway.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nope. Erbol Khamitov got a bronze in Para skiing at the World Championships in Norway.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Para skiing: Erbol Khamitov won the bronze medal at the World Championships among athletes with musculoskeletal disorders in the Norwegian city of Trondheim.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Para skiing? Wow. Any, uh, team stuff, or just individuals?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Para skiing? Wow. Any, uh, team stuff, or just individuals?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The Futsal team beat Albania 4:2 in a Euro 2026 qualifier.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Futsal team beat Albania four:two in a Euro twenty twenty six qualifier.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Futsal: The Kazakhstan national team beat Albania with a score of 4:2 in the next match of the Euro 2026 qualifying tournament.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Futsal! Nice, 4:2, that's a decent score. What about, uh, chess? Did I see something about chess?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Futsal! Nice, four:two, that's a decent score. What about, uh, chess? Did I see something about chess?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: You did. Grandmaster Kazybek Nogerbek won bronze at a festival in Cannes, France.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You did. Grandmaster Kazybek Nogerbek won bronze at a festival in Cannes, France.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Chess: Kazakhstani grandmaster Kazybek Nogerbek won the bronze medal at the International Chess Tournament Festival International des Jeux 2025 in Cannes, France.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Chess too? Cannes, like, that's pretty fancy for a chess tournament.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Chess too? Cannes, like, that's pretty fancy for a chess tournament.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And Artistic Gymnastics had Dmitry Patanin and Milad Karimi with silver, Zeynolla Idrisov with bronze. Also, canoe slalom got a gold and two bronze in Thailand.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Artistic Gymnastics had Dmitry Patanin and Milad Karimi with silver, Zeynolla Idrisov with bronze. Also, canoe slalom got a gold and two bronze in Thailand.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Artistic gymnastics: At the World Cup stage in the Azerbaijani capital Baku, Dmitry Patanin and Milad Karimi won silver medals, and Zeynolla Idrisov won bronze. Canoe slalom: At the international ranking tournament THAILAND OPEN in Pattaya, Thailand, Kazakhstani athletes won one gold and two bronze medals.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, wait, gold, silver, bronze across, like, so many different things. I totally underestimated them, uh, last month.
